sentences.en: Bosses have a way of always finding out about such things.
sentences.cn: 老板总喜欢把这类事情搞清楚。

sentences.en: Employees are being offered assistance in finding new jobs.
sentences.cn: 正在帮助雇员另觅新职。

sentences.en: Finding a second wind, he rode away from his pursuers.
sentences.cn: 他缓过劲儿来，骑马逃离了追赶他的人。

sentences.en: Finding a volunteer to write the computer program isn't a problem.
sentences.cn: 找个志愿者编这个计算机程序不成问题。

sentences.en: He kept waffling and finding excuses not to close the deal.
sentences.cn: 他一直举棋不定，找出种种理由不予成交。

sentences.en: He was an expert at finding his way, even in strange surroundings.
sentences.cn: 他是认路的行家，即使在陌生的环境中也是如此。

sentences.en: He was finding the river lonesome.
He was plainly very put out at finding her there.
sentences.cn: 发现她在那里他明显很不安。

sentences.en: Integrating the kids with the community, finding them a role, is essential.
sentences.cn: 使孩子融入社区并为他们找到某个角色非常必要。

sentences.en: Jack believed in finding happiness wherever possible.
sentences.cn: 杰克认为应该及时行乐。

sentences.en: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.--George Bernard Shaw
sentences.cn: 生活不是发现你自己，而是创造你自己！

sentences.en: She was finding it increasingly difficult to get about.
sentences.cn: 她发现出去走动越来越困难了。

sentences.en: Surveys conducted in other countries reported similar findings.
sentences.cn: 在其他国家进行的调查也报告说有类似的结果。

sentences.en: The finding ran counter to all expectations.
sentences.cn: 该发现出乎所有人的预料。

sentences.en: The man responsible for finding the volunteers is Dr. Charles Weber.
sentences.cn: 负责寻找志愿者的人是查尔斯·韦伯博士。

sentences.en: The tourist office operates a useful room-finding service.
sentences.cn: 这家旅游办事处提供十分实用的住宿查询服务。

words.tran_cn: 发现者；探测器；（照相机的）[摄] 取景器；（大望远镜上的）[天] 寻星镜

phrases.tran_cn: 故障探测，故障寻找；诊断工具

trans.tran_en: the information that someone has discovered as a result of their study, work etc
